name: Summoning Circus
description:
During a School trip, 4 kids decide to escape the hotel they are in to go to the abandoned circus they had seen from the window of the bus just before stopping for the night. With a lot of courage, they enter, surpassing the guard that was trying to stop them. Finding a pentacle on the floor, they jokingly put themselves on 4 spots they see drawn near at the edge of the pentacle. Little they knew that in this way they summoned something bad, something that now they have to banish forever.

An innovative deck-based AI system is able to put the player in the darest of situation, that never exactly know what is going to happen, but can try to prepare himself to counteract the demons.
Commanding 4 characters at once test the player’s ability to plan 2 turns ahead.

Survive and react in this strategic game that requires adaptation and precise planning.

Fully 3d graphics create a horror atmosphere that helps to set the mood for the game.

Easy to read hud renders the game easy to play, but hard to master.

DEVELOPED BY:

DROIDS IN DISGUISE TEAM (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 2, 2019/2020)
